clean_data: Oracle DBA Oracle DBA Jr Database Administrator Woodbridge VA Midlevel DBA seeking Database Administrator role in Oracle environment Authorized to work in the US for any employer Work Experience Oracle DBA George Washington Medical Faculty Associates Washington DC June 2015 to December 2016 Configured and maintained relational databases in high availability highly scalable environment Worked on a project team and was responsible for the design implementation installation and configuration of the Oracle Database Provided operational or technical support in the maintaining upgrading and performance tuning of systems software processes products or equipment Monitored alert logs for ORA errors failures and warnings Implemented the use of Oracle Recovery Manager RMAN and Oracle Recovery Catalog to backup the databases Database Administrator MedStar Georgetown University Hospital Washington DC March 2014 to June 2015 Worked with developers and end users to resolve business critical problems and keep management up to date on outstanding database related issues Executed DBA activities such as performance tuning database auditing and managing user groups database security OS space monitoring user creation and DB profiles Troubleshot and monitored RMAN Backup and Recovery Performed daily checks of tuning of database documentation including data standards procedures and definitions for the data dictionary Performed database reorganizations statistics and other applicable utilities to ensure proper database function and performance based on Oracle best practice methodology Provided database user account administration connection assistance Education Master of Science in Computer Information Systems BOSTON UNIVERSITY Boston MA August 2019 Bachelor of Science in Health Science GEORGE MASON UNIVERSITY May 2013 Skills ORACLE 3 years DATABASES 3 years DISASTER RECOVERY 3 years LINUX Less than 1 year OEM 3 years CertificationsLicenses Oracle Certified Associate December 2015 to Present Additional Information TECHNICAL SKILLS Relational Databases Oracle 10g 11g 12c Operating Systems Various Linux distros Proficient in Database Migration Upgrade and Patch Application Strong expertise in configuring and using Oracle Enterprise Manager OEM Experienced in Disaster Recovery and in configuring and managing Data Guard Proficient in Performance Tuning and Optimization Experienced in performing RMAN Backup and Recovery
